recordTypes.name: Structures in Waterways
recordTypes.description: For questions and more information regarding Bulkheads and Waterways Structures please contact the Dept. of Conservation & Waterways at 516-431-9200 or email eveltos@tohmail.org

recordTypes.name: Letter in Lieu
recordTypes.description: The letter is in place of a C.O built before 1930 and is a  Residential One-family dwelling.

recordTypes.name: Certification of Occupancy/ Certification of Completion Request
Public Assembly License/Operating Permit
recordTypes.description: Online Public Assembly License/Operating Permit Application for the filing of new licenses and the renewal of existing licensed Places of Public Assembly.

recordTypes.name: Multiple Residence Registration
recordTypes.description: Online Multiple Residence Registration for new filings and annual renewals.

recordTypes.name: BZA Granted Sign Permit Renewal
recordTypes.description: Please select this option to initiate the filing for the renewal of the 5-year Sign Permits granted by the Board of Zoning Appeals.

recordTypes.name: Christmas Tree Permit
recordTypes.description: The temporary sale and storage of Christmas trees are not permitted in Residential Zones. A town of Hempstead Claim form is to be submitted upon inspection ( Inspection Request can be made through the Open Gov Portal) of the premises after the complete restoration of the site to its original condition for the reimbursement cash bond.

recordTypes.name: Public Assembly Complaint
recordTypes.description: Select this option for the filing of complaints against existing Places of Public Assembly and Multiple Residences.  Note: any complaints associated with non-permitted Places of Public Assembly and Multiple Residences are to be addressed by the Code Enforcement Division.

recordTypes.name: Fire Escape Certification
recordTypes.description: As per the New York State Fire Code Chapter 11 Section 1104.16.5.1 (examination), fire escape stairways and balconies shall be examined for structural adequacy and safety in accordance with Section 1104.16.5 by a registered design professional or others acceptable to the fire code official every five (5) years, or as required by the fire code official.  An inspection report shall be submitted to the fire code official after such examination.

recordTypes.name: Elevator Inspection Report
recordTypes.description: It shall be the duty of the owner or agent of a building which has a passenger or freight elevator therein contained to register and provide the Department of Buildings of the Town of Hempstead with a semi-annual inspection report, which shall be obtained from a recognized elevator repair or installation company or from an insurance company.

recordTypes.name: Condition Assessments of Parking Garages
recordTypes.description: In accordance with Part 1203 Section 1203.3(J) of the Uniform Code, the Town of Hempstead Department of Buildings requires that Condition Assessments be performed for all parking garages.  The condition assessment requires that an on-site inspection and evaluation be performed by a New York State Licensed Professional Engineer for evidence of deterioration of any structural element or building component of such parking garage; evidence of the existence of any unsafe condition in such parking garage; and evidence indicating that such parking garage is an unsafe structure.

categories.name: Electrician and Plumber Licensing
categories.content: Welcome to the licensing page for the electrical and plumbing industries for The Town of Hempstead. This page provides essential information for individuals interested in pursuing careers as Master Electricians, Master Plumbers, Tri-Town Electricians, Tri-Town Plumbers, and Reciprocal Plumbers.
